Posts.Content: Halaven Tyverb and afinitor are the tablets being removed
Posts.Title: Breast cancer drugs stopped by Mr Cameron

Posts.Content: Hi, I was diagnosed with breast cancer ten years ago in December. I have been told that I have a cancerous lump in my armpit on the same side as the original diagnosis. Ten years ago I had a mastectomy and 26 lymph nodes remove and there was cancer in two of the nodes. Has anyone had the same, Does anyone know the recovery time for this current one. I have been told that it hasn't spread anywhere else. Thanks Fran
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer 2nd time around

Posts.Content: Hi Kacang The consultant has written to the GP saying that, The consultant is a lymph nodes specialist. Yeah I need to ask more questions. love Fran
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer 2nd time around

Posts.Content: Hi Hannah Thanks sending you hugs too. love Fran
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer 2nd time around

Posts.Content: Hi Maggs First thing is an operation and see if they can take it all out and then maybe chemo after that. Thanks love Fran
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer 2nd time around

Posts.Content: Hi Jan I am having an operation on the 6th July. They will be taking the lump out or as much as they can. I am assuming that I will be having chemo as well. I did mention this to the consultant but he wont say until he sees what in there and what he can do. I want to get on with it now, I know its not that long to wait. I guess I will know more then.  love  Fran xx
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer 2nd time around

Posts.Content: Hi Mistymoley I guess they will offer chemo etc, once he has got inside and see what he can remove. As I have had this all before I wonder if he assumes that I know what will happen. I am expecting to have chemo so it wont be a surprise when he tells me. love Fran
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer 2nd time around

Posts.Content: hi peeps.                                                               I need to ask you a question. What side affects are you having. How is your ammune system with it. Are you suseptable to picking up colds and bugs which last longer a than would normally. thanks  Fran xx
Posts.Title: Letrozole tablets and side affects

Posts.Content: Hi Lynne, I have always been told not to have a flu jab. Been in these a year or so now. Back to see consultant in 3rd November. Know the drill. X
Posts.Title: Letrozole tablets and side affects

Posts.Content: Hi ladies, Thanks for your replies. Any other side affects you are having. Headaches the runs etc . Fran xx
Posts.Title: Letrozole tablets and side affects

Posts.Content: I was on it but been on letrozole. The other didn't really agree with me. Neither does this or tamoxifen. Get tired, don't sleep, get infections, hands, hips and knees hurt not all the time. Dry mouth at night worse when I have a cold. Headaches etc. what a whinge bag I am lol...... Xxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Exemestane

Posts.Content: I was on it but been on letrozole. The other didn't really agree with me. Neither does this or tamoxifen. Get tired, don't sleep, get infections, hands, hips and knees hurt not all the time. Dry mouth at night worse when I have a cold. Headaches etc. what a whinge bag I am lol...... Xxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Exemestane

Posts.Content: I have seen the surgeon after having a CT Scan and a full body/bone scan and was told that I have iffy bits on my sternum but nothing to worry about. However he was happy to operate on the lump in the armpit. Had surgery on the 6th July and then was told that the lump was stuck to a main vein and they couldn't get all of it. I have been referred to the oncologist on Friday last week and they were confused because they were told that everything was fine apart from the bit they couldn't get in the armpit. The oncologist has read the scan results and they have a lot of concern about the bits on the sternum and they are having a meeting with the MDT today. As far as the scans are concerned they say that my cancer is incurable. However they are arranging chemo. Shocked to say the least and lots of tears. Not told anyone as I am waiting for confirmation.   Another thing is my right armpit smells on BO every now and then but the one with the surgery doesn't. (strange). The last thing is my husband is texting another woman early in the mornings again. I have confronted him by text this morning and he has said I need to wait until he gets home ha!!!! He has done this before, I don't need the stress.... Lots of love Fran xx
Posts.Title: Update on my cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Helen I know they are meant to protect us. Sometimes the treatment is worse than the disease itself. Just feeling sorry for myself. love Fran xx
Posts.Title: Urgent ****Memory loss and anxiety - Breast cancer and diabetes

Posts.Content: I am having memory loss and anxiety and work is slipping. I am on Letrozole, Crestor and Glucophage. Do you think that these tablets could be the cause of this?
Posts.Title: Urgent ****Memory loss and anxiety - Breast cancer and diabetes

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed back in 2007. Just been diagnosed after Christmas with diabetes. I am struggling at work with quality.. I asked for a refresher after being away from the department for 6 months. I have met the target once since coming back and told people that I cant remember things and I think the diabetes tablets have made this worse. This is then causing stress and making me ill so I am off and will be on a stage 2 sickness review. (great). I have no confidence at all. My GP is useless as well and said that I need to get rid of the negativity and try to do other things and then maybe get another job. I have just had a look at the side affects of the tablets and I don't think I should be having the crestor ones. At a loss of what to do. Love Fran xx
Posts.Title: Urgent ****Memory loss and anxiety - Breast cancer and diabetes
